helper-roles.name: helper-roles
helper-roles.info: Users with bot helper roles can use bot commands without any cooldown.
helper-roles.add-result: ✅ <@&{ROLE ID}> is now a bot helper role
helper-roles.add-error: ❌ <@&{ROLE ID}> is already a bot helper role
helper-roles.remove-result: ✅ <@&{ROLE ID}> is no longer a bot helper role
helper-roles.remove-error: ❌ <@&{ROLE ID}> is not a bot helper role

bot-admin.helper-roles<object>.title: /bot-admin helper-roles
text<text>: To reduce unnecessary bot messages in chat channels, some bot commands have cool-down or are blocked when used outside of the bot-command channel.
Users with bot helper roles are not subject to such restrictions.
- Show information about bot helper roles.
- Add up to 5 roles to the list of bot helper roles
- Remove a role from the list of bot helper roles
- Clear (reset) the list of bot helper roles.
